attributes.action: ban the use of di-hydrogen monoxide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Di-hydrogen monixde is used extensively in industry and even appears in many food items and childrens toys.  It is directly linked to climate change and increased levels of di-hydrogen monoxide in the atmosphere has the ability to bring about devastating weather, destroying crops and causing widespread flooding.

The British government should be doing something to combat the dangers posed by increased use of di-hydrogen monoxide before it's too late.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
